                  ],

                    },
                    "payload": {

    "user.signed_in": {

        "operationId": "user.signed_in",

For users that have SSO enabled, they can also [log in with their SSO](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201800126-Log-in-with-SSO). The exceptions to this are [deactivated users](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Remove-User-from-your-Account#h_6a9bc1c3-d739-4945-b1f2-00b3b88fb5cc), and users created using the `custCreate` option via the [**Create users**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/userCreate) API. These users do not have the ability to sign in with Zoom.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **User has signed in** subscription must be enabled under the **User Activity** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:read`,`user:write`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:user:master`,`user:read:user`,`user:read:user:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.signed_in`\n",

    "user.personal_notes_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "user"
        ],
        "operationId": "user.personal_notes_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# user.personal_notes_updated\n\nThe **User's personal notes have been updated** event is triggered every time one of your app users or account users updates personal notes on the Zoom Client app.\n\nUsers that are signed in to Zoom can set their presence status in the [Zoom Client apps](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/207373866-Zoom-Installers) can specify a personal note that appears at the top of the chat profile to anyone who can see the profile. The note can be changed as often as needed and is commonly used to provide a meaningful note, a job title, or to include detailed information about the user's presence status.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **User's personal notes have been updated** subscription must be enabled under the **User Activity** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:read`,`user:write`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:personal_note:master`,`user:read:personal_note`,`user:read:personal_note:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.personal_notes_updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "object",
                      "old_object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user's account owner."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the user.",
                        "required": [
                          "date_time",
                          "email",
                          "id",
                          "personal_notes"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the user's personal note was updated."
                          },
                          "email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The user's email address."
                          },
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's ID."
                          },
                          "personal_notes": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The updated [personal note](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115002571866-Using-the-Personal-Note-for-your-chat-profile)."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      },
                      "old_object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the user's previous personal note.",
                        "required": [
                          "personal_notes"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "personal_notes": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The previous personal note entry."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"user.personal_notes_updated\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n      \"email\": \"jchill@example.com\",\n      \"date_time\": \"\",\n      \"personal_notes\": \"New note.\"\n    },\n    \"old_object\": {\n      \"personal_notes\": \"Old note.\"\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "required": [
                        "account_id",
                        "object",
                        "old_object"
                      ],
                      "properties": {
                        "account_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The account ID of the user's account owner."
                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "Information about the user.",
                          "required": [
                            "date_time",
                            "email",
                            "id",
                            "personal_notes"
                          ],
                          "properties": {
                            "date_time": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "format": "date-time",
                              "description": "The date and time at which the user's personal note was updated."
                            },

        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# group.deleted\n\nThe **Group deleted** event is triggered every time one of your app users or account users delete a group. Groups can be deleted in the [Zoom web portal](https://support.zoomus/hc/en-us/articles/204519819-Managing-user-groups-and-settings) or via the [**Delete a group**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/groupDelete) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Group deleted** subscription enabled under the **Group** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `group:read:admin`,`group:write:admin`,`group:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `group:read:group:master`,`group:read:group:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `group.deleted`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],

                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",

                        "additionalProperties": false

The user can be added either from the [Zoom Web Portal](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363183-User-Management#h_335dcf54-d106-4c8d-8533-68e2fc3d20a6) or by using the [**Create users**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/userCreate) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **User has been created** subscription must be enabled under the **User** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:user:master`,`user:read:user:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.created`\n",
          "content": {

              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],

                        "description": "The account ID of the user who created the user."

Encryption data is stored in the cloud. \n* e2ee \u2014 End-to-end encryption. The encryption key is stored on the local device and cannot be obtained by anyone else. Enabling E2EE also [**disables** certain features](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360048660871), such as cloud recording, live streaming, and allowing participants to join before the host.",

For meetings with alphanumeric passwords, a numeric password will be generated."

                                    },
                                    "webinar_password": {

        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# user.deleted\n\nThe **User has been deleted** event is triggered when an admin or account owner deletes a user from a Zoom account.\n\nDeleting users permanently removes them and their data from the Zoom system.\nTo delete a user, use the [**Delete a user**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/userDelete) with `delete` as the value for `action` query parameter or [delete the user from the Zoom Web Portal](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Remove-User-from-your-Account#h_7402c643-23d1-48f7-8cf3-efefdb678a88) itself.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscription** must be enabled for your [Marketplace App](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **User has been deleted** subscription must be enabled under the **User** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:master`,`user:read`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:user:master`,`user:read:user:admin`,`user:read:user`\n\n**Event type**: `user.deleted`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },

                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the account from which the user was deleted."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user that deleted the user."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user that deleted the user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the deleted user.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "email",
                          "type"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's ID."
                          },
                          "first_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's first name."
                          },
                          "last_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's last name."
                          },
                          "email": {

                            "description": "The user's email address."

                          "type": {

                            "description": "The type of user: \n* 1 \u2014 Basic. \n* 2 \u2014 Licensed.",
                            "enum": [

                              2

                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },

    "user.deactivated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "user"

        "operationId": "user.deactivated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# user.deactivated\n\nThe **User has been deactivated** event is triggered every time one of your app users or account users gets deactivated.\n\nAdmins and account owners can deactivate users in a Zoom account as well as activate the previously deactivated users. Deactivated users cannot log into their Zoom account and they do not have access to utilize any of the Zoom features. Users can be deactivated either from the [Zoom Web Portal](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Remove-User-from-your-Account#h_6a9bc1c3-d739-4945-b1f2-00b3b88fb5cc) or by using the [**Update user status**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/userStatus) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **User has been deactivated** subscription must be enabled under the **User** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:user:master`,`user:read:user:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.deactivated`\n",

            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],

    "user.settings_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "user"
        ],
        "operationId": "user.settings_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# user.settings_updated\n\nZoom triggers the **User's settings have been updated** event when a user updates the settings of your app users or account.\n\nZoom users can update the settings on their profile manually from the [settings page on the Zoom Web Portal](https://zoom.us/profile/setting). Alternatively, the settings can also be updated by calling the [**Update user settings**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/userSettingsUpdate) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **User's settings have been updated** subscription must be enabled under the **User** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:read`,`user:write`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:settings:master`,`user:read:settings`,`user:read:settings:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.settings_updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The event's name."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp, in milliseconds since epoch, at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "operator": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The email address of the user who [disassociated the user](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Removing-a-user-from-your-account#h_98a81098-0ca3-45ae-8d00-aab235cc781d).",
                    "format": "email"
                  },
                  "operator_id": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The user ID of the user who updated the settings."
                  },
                  "time_stamp": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "description": "A timestamp that indicates when the setting was updated."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the account that updated the settings."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who [disassociated the user](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Removing-a-user-from-your-account#h_98a81098-0ca3-45ae-8d00-aab235cc781d).",
                        "format": "email"
                      },

                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user who updated the settings."

                                        "type": "string",
                                        "description": "The type of phone number masking pattern to apply. \n* mask_default - Default masking pattern (Example: 888****666). \n* mask_first_5 - Mask first five digits (Example: *****66666). \n* mask_except_last_4 - Mask everything except last four digits (Example: *****6666).",
                                        "example": "mask_default",

                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              },

                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Use a [PMI (Personal Meeting ID)](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203276937-Using-Personal-Meeting-ID-PMI-) to schedule meeting."
                                  },
                                  "pstn_password_protected": {
                                    "type": "string",
                                    "description": "Require a password from participants before joining a meeting via [PSTN](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/204517069-Getting-Started-with-Personal-Audio-Conference)."
                                  },
                                  "jbh_time": {
                                    "type": "integer",
                                    "enum": [
                                      0,
                                      5,
                                      10,
                                      15
                                    ],
                                    "description": "If the value of the join_before_host field is true, this field indicates the time limits within which a participant can join a meeting before the meeting's host:\n\n* 0 \u2014 Allow the participant to join the meeting at anytime.\n* 5 \u2014 Allow the participant to join 5 minutes before the meeting's start time.\n* 10 \u2014 Allow the participant to join 10 minutes before the meeting's start time."
                                  },
                                  "personal_meeting": {
                                    "description": "The personal meeting settings:\n* true \u2014 Indicates that the **Enable Personal Meeting ID** setting is enabled. Users can use a personal meeting ID for their meetings.\n* false \u2014 Indicates that the **Enable Personal Meeting ID** setting is [disabled](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362843-Personal-meeting-ID-PMI-and-personal-link#h_aa0335c8-3b06-41bc-bc1f-a8b84ef17f2a). When this setting is **disabled**, meetings that were scheduled with a PMI will be invalid.                                     "type": "boolean"

                                  },

                                      "jbh_only",

                                    ]
                                  },

                                    "type": "boolean"

                                  },

                                    "type": "string",

                                  "upcoming_meeting_reminder": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether to receive a desktop notification for upcoming meetings."
                                  }
                                },
                                "additionalProperties": false
                              },
                              "in_meeting": {
                                "type": "object",
                                "description": "Information about the in meeting settings.",
                                "properties": {

                                    "type": "boolean"

                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether meeting participants can use [in-meeting chat](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203650445-In-Meeting-Chat)."

                                    "description": "Whether to display a thumbs up or thumbs down feedback survey at the end of each meeting.",
                                    "type": "boolean"
                                  },
                                  "whiteboard": {
                                    "description": "Whether to enable the [classic whiteboard](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/205677665-Sharing-a-whiteboard) feature.",
                                    "type": "boolean"
                                  },
                                  "allow_users_to_delete_messages_in_meeting_chat": {

    "user.invitation_accepted": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "user"
        ],
        "operationId": "user.invitation_accepted",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# user.invitation_accepted\n\nThe **User has accepted the account invitation** event is triggered every time a user accepts the invitation to join a Zoom account.\n\nAdmins and account owners can add new users as well as existing users with free Zoom accounts to an account. The user can be added either from the [Zoom Web Portal](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363183-User-Management#h_335dcf54-d106-4c8d-8533-68e2fc3d20a6) or by using the [**Create users**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/userCreate) API. Once a user is added, an invitation email is sent to the user.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **User has accepted the account invitation** subscription must be enabled under the **User** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:user:master`,`user:read:user:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.invitation_accepted`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the account from which the invitation was sent to the user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the user.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "email",
                          "type"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's ID."
                          },
                          "first_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's first name."
                          },
                          "last_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's last name."
                          },
                          "email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The user's email address."
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "description": "The type of user: \n* 1 \u2014 Basic. \n* 2 \u2014 Licensed.",
                            "enum": [
                              1,
                              2
                            ]
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"user.invitation_accepted\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n      \"first_name\": \"Jill\",\n      \"last_name\": \"Chill\",\n      \"email\": \"jchill@example.com\",\n      \"type\": 3\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }

    "group.created": {

        "operationId": "group.created",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# group.created\n\nThe **Group created** event is triggered every time one of your app users or account users creates a group. Groups can be added in the [Zoom web portal](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/204519819-Managing-user-groups-and-settings#h_1e8d02d6-3ab6-4084-81e1-27e47864f262) or via the [**Create a group**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/groupCreate) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Group created** subscription enabled under the **Group** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `group:read:admin`,`group:write:admin`,`group:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `group:read:group:master`,`group:read:group:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `group.created`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],

    "group.settings_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "group"
        ],
        "operationId": "group.settings_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# group.settings_updated\n\nZoom triggers the **Group's setting updated** event when account owners or users update a group's [settings](https://zoom.us/account/group/{groupId}/setting).\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** are enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The \"**Group's setting updated**\" subscription enabled under the **Group** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `group:read:admin`,`group:write:admin`,`group:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `group:read:settings:master`,`group:read:settings:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `group.settings_updated`\n",

                  "event_ts",

                        "description": "The user ID of the user that updated the group's settings."

                            "description": "The updated group's ID."

                                      },
                                      "numbers": {
                                        "type": "array",
                                        "maxItems": 100,
                                        "description": "The group's **Toll-free and Fee-based Toll Call** phone number information.",

                                    }

                                    "properties": {

                                        "example": true

                                              "example": "CN"
                                            },
                                            "country_name": {
                                              "type": "string",
                                              "description": "The country name.",
                                              "example": "China"

                                  },
                                  "call_me_and_invite_by_phone": {
                                    "type": "object",

                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "require_press_1_for_call_me": {
                                        "type": "string",

                                        "example": "auto",

                                        ],
                                        "x-enum-descriptions": [

                                        "type": "object",

                                            "items": {
                                              "type": "object",
                                              "properties": {
                                                "code": {

                                                  "description": "The [code](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/other-references/abbreviation-lists/#countries) of the country or region.",
                                                  "example": "CN"
                                                },
                                                "name": {
                                                  "type": "string",
                                                  "description": "The name of the country or region.",
                                                  "example": "China"
                                                }
                                              }
                                            }
                                          }
                                        },
                                        "description": "The group's call out countries/regions settings."
                                      },
                                      "allow_webinar_attendees_call_me": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether webinar attendees can use Call Me to connect audio. This feature is only available in version 5.2.2 and higher.",
                                        "example": true

                                    },
                                    "description": "The group's [**Call Me and Invite by Phone**](https://support.zoom.com/hc/en/article?id=zm_kb&sysparm_article=KB0067414#h_01F53VG7NCJDZ238VVXZDJ8QMH) settings."
                                  },
                                  "personal_audio_conference": {
                                    "type": "boolean",
                                    "description": "Whether the group has the [**Personal Audio Conference**](https://support.zoom.com/hc/en/article?id=zm_kb&sysparm_article=KB0060449#h_01F5BPMNMERFWXN5S8ZJRZZCSE) setting enabled.",
                                    "example": true
                                  },
                                  "participant_phone_masking": {
                                    "type": "object",
                                    "properties": {
                                      "enable": {
                                        "type": "boolean",
                                        "description": "Whether the group has the [**Mask phone number in the participant list**](https://support.zoom.com/hc/en/article?id=zm_kb&sysparm_article=KB0067881#h_01F5K5GT9P563K751K3JNAYE6E) setting enabled.",
                                        "example": true
                                      },
                                      "masking_type": {
                                        "type": "string",
                                        "description": "The type of phone number masking pattern to apply. \n* mask_default - Default masking pattern (Example: 888****666). \n* mask_first_5 - Mask first five digits (Example: *****66666). \n* mask_except_last_4 - Mask everything except last four digits (Example: *****6666).",
                                        "example": "mask_default",
                                        "enum": [
                                          "mask_default",
                                          "mask_first_5",
                                          "mask_except_last_4"
                                        ],
                                        "x-enum-descriptions": [

                                  }
                                }
                              },
                              "email_notification": {
                                "type": "object",

                                  },

Calls from members of the **Auto Answer Group** will be automatically answered the user."

    "user.disassociated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "user"
        ],
        "operationId": "user.disassociated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# user.disassociated\n\nThe **User has been disassociated** event is triggered every time one of your app users or account users is unlinked from an account.\n\nUnlinking a user from an account allows them to maintain their own Zoom account with existing settings, meetings, webinars, and Cloud recordings. Users can be disassociated from a Zoom account [via the Zoom Web Portal](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Remove-User-from-your-Account#h_98a81098-0ca3-45ae-8d00-aab235cc781d) or via the [**Delete a user**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/userDelete) API with `disassociate` as the value of `action` query parameter.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **User has been disassociated** subscription must be enabled under the **User** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:user:master`,`user:read:user:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.disassociated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the account from which the user was disassociated."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user that disassociated the user."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user that disassociated the user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the disassociated user.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "first_name",
                          "last_name",
                          "email",
                          "type"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's ID."
                          },
                          "first_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's first name."
                          },
                          "last_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's last name."
                          },
                          "email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The user's email address."
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "description": "The type of user: \n* 1 \u2014 Basic. \n* 2 \u2014 Licensed.",
                            "enum": [
                              1,
                              2
                            ]
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"user.disassociated\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n      \"first_name\": \"Jill\",\n      \"last_name\": \"Chill\",\n      \"email\": \"jchill@example.com\",\n      \"type\": 3\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "required": [
                        "account_id",
                        "operator",
                        "operator_id",
                        "object"
                      ],

    "user.presence_status_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "user"
        ],
        "operationId": "user.presence_status_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# user.presence_status_updated\n\nThe **User's presence status has been updated** event is triggered every time one of your app users' presence status is updated in the Zoom Client app.\n\nUsers that are signed in to Zoom can set their [presence status](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360032554051-Status-Icons) in the [Zoom Client apps](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/207373866-Zoom-Installers) to either \"Available\", \"Away\" or \"Do_Not_Disturb\". By default, when a user signs in, the status is set to \"Available\". When a user is in a meeting, the status is set to \"In_Meeting\". When a user is sharing the screen during a meeting, the status is set to \"Presenting\". When the user is on a Zoom Phone call, the status is set to \"On_Phone_Call\". When the user is in a calendar event (from a synced calendar) but hasn't joined a Zoom meeting, the status is set to \"In_Calendar_Event\".\nUser's desktop device is offline, but mobile device is signed in, the status is set to \"Mobile_signed_in\".\n\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **User's presence status has been updated** subscription must be enabled under the **User Activity** event.\n\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:read`,`user:write`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:presence_status:master`,`user:read:presence_status`,`user:read:presence_status:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.presence_status_updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user's account owner."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the user.",
                        "required": [
                          "date_time",
                          "email",
                          "id",
                          "presence_status"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the user's presence status was updated."
                          },
                          "email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The user's email address."
                          },
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's ID."
                          },
                          "presence_status": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's [presence status](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360032554051-Setting-your-presence-status): \n* Available \u2014 Online. \n* Away \u2014 Away. \n* Do_Not_Disturb \u2014 Do not disturb. \n* In_Meeting \u2014 In a Zoom meeting. \n* Presenting \u2014 User is sharing their screen in a Zoom meeting. \n* On_Phone_Call \u2014 On a Zoom Phone call. \n* In_Calendar_Event \u2014 In a calendar event. \n* Offline \n* Mobile_signed_in \u2014 User's desktop device is offline, but mobile device is signed in.",
                            "enum": [
                              "Available",
                              "Away",
                              "Do_Not_Disturb",
                              "In_Meeting",
                              "Presenting",
                              "On_Phone_Call",
                              "In_Calendar_Event",
                              "Offline",
                              "Busy",
                              "Mobile_signed_in"
                            ]
                          },
                          "app": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "description": "Information about the app that triggered the event. ",
                            "required": [
                              "type",
                              "presence_status"
                            ],
                            "properties": {
                              "type": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The app's type. : \n* desktop \u2014 Desktop Software. \n* mobile - Mobile device. \n* pad - iPad or tablet. \n* pzr \u2014 Personal Zoom Room.",
                                "enum": [
                                  "desktop",
                                  "mobile",
                                  "pad",
                                  "pzr"
                                ]
                              },
                              "presence_status": {
                                "type": "string",
                                "description": "The user's [presence status](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360032554051-Setting-your-presence-status) on app: \n* Available \u2014 Online. \n* Away \u2014 Away. \n* Do_Not_Disturb \u2014 Do not disturb. \n* In_Meeting \u2014 In a Zoom meeting. \n* Presenting \u2014 User is sharing their screen in a Zoom meeting. \n* On_Phone_Call \u2014 On a Zoom Phone call. \n* In_Calendar_Event \u2014 In a calendar event. \n* Offline",
                                "enum": [
                                  "Available",
                                  "Away",
                                  "Do_Not_Disturb",
                                  "In_Meeting",
                                  "Presenting",
                                  "On_Phone_Call",
                                  "In_Calendar_Event",
                                  "Offline",
                                  "Busy"
                                ]
                              }
                            },
                            "additionalProperties": false
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"user.presence_status_updated\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"date-time\": \"2019-11-26T20:13:57Z\",\n      \"email\": \"jchill@example.com\",\n      \"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n      \"presence_status\": \"Away\",\n      \"app\" : {\n        \"type\" : \"mobile\",\n        \"presence_status\": \"Offline\"\n\t  }\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "required": [
                        "account_id",
                        "object"
                      ],
                      "properties": {
                        "account_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The account ID of the user's account owner."
                        },
                        "object": {
                          "type": "object",
                          "description": "Information about the user.",
                          "required": [
                            "date_time",
                            "email",
                            "id",
                            "presence_status"
                          ],
                          "properties": {
                            "date_time": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "format": "date-time",
                              "description": "The date and time at which the user's presence status was updated."
                            },
                            "email": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "format": "email",
                              "description": "The user's email address."
                            },
                            "id": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The user's ID."
                            },
                            "presence_status": {
                              "type": "string",
                              "description": "The user's [presence status](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360032554051-Setting-your-presence-status): \n* Available \u2014 Online. \n* Away \u2014 Away. \n* Do_Not_Disturb \u2014 Do not disturb. \n* In_Meeting \u2014 In a Zoom meeting. \n* Presenting \u2014 User is sharing their screen in a Zoom meeting. \n* On_Phone_Call \u2014 On a Zoom Phone call. \n* In_Calendar_Event \u2014 In a calendar event. \n* Offline \n* Mobile_signed_in \u2014 User's desktop device is offline, but mobile device is signed in.",
                              "enum": [
                                "Available",
                                "Away",
                                "Do_Not_Disturb",
                                "In_Meeting",
                                "Presenting",
                                "On_Phone_Call",
                                "In_Calendar_Event",
                                "Offline",
                                "Busy",
                                "Mobile_signed_in"
                              ]
                            },
                            "app": {
                              "type": "object",
                              "description": "Information about the app that triggered the event. ",
                              "required": [
                                "type",
                                "presence_status"
                              ],
                              "properties": {
                                "type": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The app's type. : \n* desktop \u2014 Desktop Software. \n* mobile - Mobile device. \n* pad - iPad or tablet. \n* pzr \u2014 Personal Zoom Room.",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "desktop",
                                    "mobile",
                                    "pad",
                                    "pzr"
                                  ]
                                },
                                "presence_status": {
                                  "type": "string",
                                  "description": "The user's [presence status](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360032554051-Setting-your-presence-status) on app: \n* Available \u2014 Online. \n* Away \u2014 Away. \n* Do_Not_Disturb \u2014 Do not disturb. \n* In_Meeting \u2014 In a Zoom meeting. \n* Presenting \u2014 User is sharing their screen in a Zoom meeting. \n* On_Phone_Call \u2014 On a Zoom Phone call. \n* In_Calendar_Event \u2014 In a calendar event. \n* Offline",
                                  "enum": [
                                    "Available",
                                    "Away",
                                    "Do_Not_Disturb",
                                    "In_Meeting",

    "user.activated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "user"
        ],
        "operationId": "user.activated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# user.activated\n\nThe **User has been activated** event is triggered every time one of your app users or account users activates a deactivated user.\n\nAdmins and account owners can deactivate users in a Zoom account as well as activate the previously deactivated users. To activate a user who was previously deactivated, call the [**Update user status**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/userStatus) API or [activate the user from the Zoom Web Portal](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Remove-User-from-your-Account#h_16319724-d120-4be6-af5d-31582d134ea0). Any licenses or plans that the user had prior to deactivation will have to be reassigned after activation.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **User has been activated** subscription must be enabled under the **User** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:user:master`,`user:read:user:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.activated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "operator",
                      "operator_id",
                      "object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user's account owner."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user that activated the user."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user that activated the user."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the activated user.",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "first_name",
                          "last_name",
                          "email",
                          "type"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's ID."
                          },
                          "first_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's first name."
                          },
                          "last_name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's last name."
                          },
                          "email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The user's email address."
                          },
                          "type": {
                            "type": "integer",
                            "description": "The type of user: \n* 1 \u2014 Basic. \n* 2 \u2014 Licensed.",
                            "enum": [
                              1,
                              2
                            ]
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"user.activated\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"operator\": \"admin@example.com\",\n    \"operator_id\": \"z8yCxjabcdEFGHfp8uQ\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n      \"first_name\": \"Dana\",\n      \"last_name\": \"Lee\",\n      \"email\": \"jchill@example.com\",\n      \"type\": 3\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {

    "user.signed_in": {

        "operationId": "user.signed_in",
        "requestBody": {

For users that have SSO enabled, they can also [log in with their SSO](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201800126-Log-in-with-SSO). The exceptions to this are [deactivated users](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115005269946-Remove-User-from-your-Account#h_6a9bc1c3-d739-4945-b1f2-00b3b88fb5cc), and users created using the `custCreate` option via the [**Create users**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/userCreate) API. These users do not have the ability to sign in with Zoom.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **User has signed in** subscription must be enabled under the **User Activity** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:read`,`user:write`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:user:master`,`user:read:user`,`user:read:user:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.signed_in`\n",

                  },

    "user.personal_notes_updated": {
      "post": {
        "tags": [
          "user"
        ],
        "operationId": "user.personal_notes_updated",
        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# user.personal_notes_updated\n\nThe **User's personal notes have been updated** event is triggered every time one of your app users or account users updates personal notes on the Zoom Client app.\n\nUsers that are signed in to Zoom can set their presence status in the [Zoom Client apps](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/207373866-Zoom-Installers) can specify a personal note that appears at the top of the chat profile to anyone who can see the profile. The note can be changed as often as needed and is commonly used to provide a meaningful note, a job title, or to include detailed information about the user's presence status.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **User's personal notes have been updated** subscription must be enabled under the **User Activity** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:read`,`user:write`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:personal_note:master`,`user:read:personal_note`,`user:read:personal_note:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.personal_notes_updated`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },
                  "event_ts": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },
                  "payload": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "required": [
                      "account_id",
                      "object",
                      "old_object"
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                      "account_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user's account owner."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the user.",
                        "required": [
                          "date_time",
                          "email",
                          "id",
                          "personal_notes"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "date_time": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "date-time",
                            "description": "The date and time at which the user's personal note was updated."
                          },
                          "email": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "format": "email",
                            "description": "The user's email address."
                          },
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The user's ID."
                          },
                          "personal_notes": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The updated [personal note](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115002571866-Using-the-Personal-Note-for-your-chat-profile)."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      },
                      "old_object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "description": "Information about the user's previous personal note.",
                        "required": [
                          "personal_notes"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "personal_notes": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The previous personal note entry."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }
                },
                "additionalProperties": false
              },
              "examples": {
                "json-example": {
                  "summary": "JSON example",
                  "value": "{\n  \"event\": \"user.personal_notes_updated\",\n  \"event_ts\": 1626230691572,\n  \"payload\": {\n    \"account_id\": \"AAAAAABBBB\",\n    \"object\": {\n      \"id\": \"abcD3ojfdbjfg\",\n      \"email\": \"jchill@example.com\",\n      \"date_time\": \"\",\n      \"personal_notes\": \"New note.\"\n    },\n    \"old_object\": {\n      \"personal_notes\": \"Old note.\"\n    }\n  }\n}"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "content": {
              "application/json": {
                "schema": {
                  "type": "object",
                  "required": [
                    "event",
                    "event_ts",
                    "payload"
                  ],
                  "properties": {
                    "event": {
                      "type": "string",
                      "description": "The name of the event."
                    },
                    "event_ts": {
                      "type": "integer",
                      "format": "int64",
                      "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                    },
                    "payload": {
                      "type": "object",
                      "required": [
                        "account_id",
                        "object",
                        "old_object"
                      ],
                      "properties": {
                        "account_id": {
                          "type": "string",
                          "description": "The account ID of the user's account owner."

    "group.deleted": {

        "requestBody": {
          "description": "# group.deleted\n\nThe **Group deleted** event is triggered every time one of your app users or account users delete a group. Groups can be deleted in the [Zoom web portal](https://support.zoomus/hc/en-us/articles/204519819-Managing-user-groups-and-settings) or via the [**Delete a group**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/groupDelete) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**.\n\t* The **Group deleted** subscription enabled under the **Group** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `group:read:admin`,`group:write:admin`,`group:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `group:read:group:master`,`group:read:group:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `group.deleted`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",

                        "description": "The email address of the user that deleted the group."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user that deleted the group."
                      },
                      "time_stamp": {
                        "type": "integer",
                        "format": "int64",
                        "description": "A timestamp that indicates when the group was deleted, in milliseconds."
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object",
                        "required": [
                          "id",
                          "name"
                        ],
                        "properties": {
                          "id": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The group ID."
                          },
                          "name": {
                            "type": "string",
                            "description": "The group name."
                          }
                        },
                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }
                    },
                    "additionalProperties": false
                  }

              },

          "description": "# user.created\n\nThe **User has been created** event is triggered every time one of your app users or account users adds another user to the account.\n\nAdmins and account owners can add new users to an account. The user can be added either from the [Zoom Web Portal](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363183-User-Management#h_335dcf54-d106-4c8d-8533-68e2fc3d20a6) or by using the [**Create users**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/userCreate) API.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\n* A Pro or higher plan.\n* **Event Subscriptions** must be enabled for your [Marketplace app](https://marketplace.zoom.us/user/build) with the following configurations:\n\t* A valid **Event Notification Endpoint URL**\n\t* The **User has been created** subscription must be enabled under the **User** event.\n\n\n\n**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:admin`,`user:write:admin`,`user:master`\n\n**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `user:read:user:master`,`user:read:user:admin`\n\n**Event type**: `user.created`\n",
          "content": {
            "application/json": {
              "schema": {
                "type": "object",
                "required": [
                  "event",
                  "event_ts",
                  "payload"
                ],
                "properties": {
                  "event": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the event."
                  },

                    "type": "integer",
                    "format": "int64",
                    "description": "A timestamp at which the event occurred."
                  },

                      "operator",
                      "creation_type",
                      "object",
                      "operator_id"
                    ],
                    "properties": {

                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The account ID of the user who created the user."
                      },
                      "operator": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "email",
                        "description": "The email address of the user who created the new user."
                      },
                      "operator_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The user ID of the user that created the new user."
                      },

                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The method used to create the new user: \n* create \n* ssoCreate \n* autoCreate \n* custCreate",
                        "enum": [

                          "custCreate"

                            "enum": [

                          }

                        "additionalProperties": false
                      }

                }
